column5: Finally got out with my daughter for a couple days of fishing last week.    In 3 days we fished 11 hours and picked up about 75 of these babies. Including 13 double headers.  my daughter got the biggest of the trip at 18 lbs    And I ran into this old OFNer sitting across the dinner table from me.    Seems I ended up there at the same time as he was doing his free trip
Who is that guy with the Canadian flag?? Looks familiar somehow!!  ( "got into some lake trout" he said Well, that's a classic understatement. 75 trout---that's about 25 years worth on Simcoe! )
It seems Great Slave Lake has as good a fishing as they say it does
That's awesome , can't even imagine getting that many lakers . Very cool to bump into Mike !
contrary to the goofs around here...i miss mike!  frig those are beauty lakers...well done!
that's amazing fishing.....hell yeah....good to see mike too...
Good to see you managed to get out Dara.
Just don't ever recommend North Star Adventures...what a bunch of losers.  http://northstaradventures.ca/
So many of us dream for a trip like that. Thanks for sharing.
Amazing!  I was gonna say, if you were getting that many in that size range close to home you're doing something right lol
Those are real nice lakers dude.  Looks like someones gained a few pounds.LOL  Great pics.

Very cool father/ daughter get away. Probably some good bonding time up there on that legendary lake.  Did you guys fish pike at all? Is that Borger guy an A hole or is he alright? Pretty small world.

Mike seems like a pretty decent guy...sure likes to fish.  The trip was actually a 30/60 birthday thing for us...4 days apart and they made her a cake while we were there Thanks to the staff at Frontier Lodge  And no, we didn't go for pike...eewwww
Is that Borger guy an A hole or is he alright?   Udunno. Waddya tink?? Maybe we should vote on it, or do a poll??
Those fish look so slender and muscular,   Not like the gross blobs of laker we get down on Lake Ontario.   Nice going.
Hammer time! That lake is on my bucket list. Way to go CPP member.
